PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MaterialThermal
PropertySetDef.Definition: A set of thermal material properties.

PropertyDef.Name: SpecificHeatCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition:
Defines the specific heat capacity of a material.
Defines the specific heat of the material: heat energy absorbed per temperature unit.

PropertyDef.Name: BoilingPoint
PropertyDef.Definition: The boiling point of the material (fluid).

PropertyDef.Name: FreezingPoint
PropertyDef.Definition: The freezing point of the material (fluid).

PropertyDef.Name: ThermalConductivity
PropertyDef.Definition:
The thermal conductivity of the object.
The rate at which thermal energy is transmitted through the material.
